alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 4:44PM MST until February 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, 231, 232, AND 233... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, 231, 232, AND 233... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228, 229, 230, 231, 232 and 233. * Winds...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
